title: Asura-chan

params.attack: Piercing (*If you attack a player between you and your goal, your attack is one level above their defense value and bypasses all effects that would prevent it. Otherwise, it's Basic.*)

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Run away and escape, leaving the game and winning. You may only use this when there are no players between you and your goal on the player list.
- Fly and step, attacking the four players above or the four players below you on the player list.
- Cheat and sneak, Astrally attacking any three players and hiding their causes of death.
- Prance and skip, moving yourself two spaces on the player list in a direction of your choice.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Your goal is ten spaces above or below you on the player list, whichever direction works. For example, if you're player 1, your goal is in between players 10 and 11.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ditch all the losers and their half-assed lies.

desc:
Post 2307
*Bleed ‘em dry and take the throne—you hear it calling!*
Roleblock and redirect immune
